text: Bonus () is a 1975 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergey Mikaelyan10 лет без Олега Янковского: малоизвестные роли легендарного актераПРЕМИЯ (1974) and stars Yevgeny Leonov, Vladimir Samoilov, and Oleg Yankovsky. ==Actors== * Yevgeny Leonov as Vasilij Potapov, Supervisor * Vladimir Samoilov as Pavel Batarcev, Trust Director * Oleg Yankovsky as Lev . Solomahin, local Communist Party Secretary * Mikhail Gluzsky as Boris Shatunov, Head of the Planning Department * Armen Dzhigarkhanyan as Grigorij Frolovski, Chief Manager * Leonid D'jachkov as Viktor Chernikov, Head of the Construction Department * Aleksandr Pashutin as Oleg Kachnov, Supervisor * Viktor Sergachjov as Roman Lyubaev, Safety Engineer * Boryslav Brondukov as Aleksandr Zyubin, Foreman * Svetlana Kryuchkova as Aleksandra Mikhajlovna, Crane Driver * Mikhail Semyonov as Anatolij Zharikov, Secretary of the local Komsomol branch * Nina Urgant as Dina Milenina, Economist == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1975 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Bonus (movie)
